projects.title: AI-Powered ASO Optimization Platform
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Development
projects.heroSubtitle: A data-intelligent solution for maximizing mobile app visibility and conversion on the Apple App Store and Google Play
projects.summary: An intelligent, data-driven engine that uses machine learning to maximize visibility, ranking, and conversion across major app stores.
projects.clientOverview: The client is a specialized consultancy supporting mobile apps and game studios worldwide. Their focus is on helping teams grow, scale, and optimize their mobile presence across global markets.
projects.businessChallenge: App Store Optimization (ASO) is essential for driving organic growth, yet traditional approaches rely heavily on manual keyword testing, intuition, and time-consuming analysis. The client faced several limitations: slow manual testing cycles, fragmented tools without predictive intelligence, limited ability to identify ranking opportunities across markets, difficulty correlating App Store and Google Play data, and no unified real-time visibility into keyword performance. To gain a competitive advantage, they needed an AI-driven ASO engine capable of learning from historical data, predicting keyword performance, and automating optimization decisions.
solution: Cloud-Native AI System on GCP: The platform is built on Google Cloud Platform with scalable architecture for continuous data ingestion, training, and inference
Direct Integration with App Store APIs: Connected directly to Apple App Store APIs and Google Play Store APIs to collect real-time keyword, ranking, and metadata performance

Machine Learning Keyword Testing: Using Vertex AI, implemented ML models that analyze historical performance patterns, evaluate keyword competitiveness, predict ranking potential, and recommend impactful keywords for each market
Automated Optimization Engine: The system continuously tests variations, learns from outcomes, and updates keyword recommendations—eliminating manual guesswork

Unified Visibility Through Looker Dashboards: All insights are visualized in custom Looker dashboards providing cross-store analytics, keyword opportunity mapping, conversion trend tracking, and ASO performance forecasting
Continuous Deployment & Data Pipeline Automation: A CI/CD-driven infrastructure ensures seamless updates, stable releases, and automated data processing across the entire platform
projects.solutionIntro: We engineered a fully AI-powered ASO platform that transforms how teams evaluate, test, and optimize keyword strategies:
projects.solutionOutro: This comprehensive platform combines machine learning with real-time data to deliver predictive, automated ASO optimization.
benefits: Adopt data-driven ASO, powered by predictive intelligence
Improve visibility and conversion rates through actionable ML recommendations
Automate optimization workflows, significantly reducing manual effort
Gain unified insight from both Apple and Google ecosystems
Scale globally, with models adaptable across languages, markets, and categories
Accelerate decision-making, backed by real-time data and automated tests

projects.title: Observability Implementation with Grafana
projects.client: Innovative Tech Provider for Complex Engineering
projects.subtitle: Observability Platform Implementation
projects.heroSubtitle: Design and implementation of a centralized monitoring, logging, and alerting platform for a critical application stack
projects.summary: A centralized monitoring, logging, and alerting platform delivering full visibility and proactive operations across the entire application stack
projects.clientOverview: The client is an innovative technology provider working with complex engineering environments. Their core platform operates on a multi-layer application stack requiring continuous monitoring of performance, availability, and security.
projects.businessChallenge: The organization ran a critical application ecosystem built on Strapi (Node.js), Angular, and PostgreSQL. However, they lacked a unified observability layer, resulting in: fragmented monitoring tools with no central visibility, limited insight into performance bottlenecks, insufficient log correlation across different system layers, slow incident diagnosis and difficulty identifying root causes, and gaps in security awareness—especially intrusion attempts and firewall activity. To ensure reliability and operational continuity, the client needed a centralized monitoring, logging, and alerting platform that spanned all components.
solution: Metrics with Prometheus: Implemented Prometheus to collect system, application, and database metrics—including custom instrumentation for the Strapi/Node.js application
Log Management with Loki: Integrated Loki for centralized log ingestion and correlation across all layers (application, database, OS, security)
Visualization & Alerting with Grafana: Built Grafana as the unified analytics and alerting engine, providing real-time visibility and proactive operational triggers
Security Monitoring Integration: Connected Fail2Ban, CSF, and firewall logs to the observability stack to monitor security events and intrusion attempts
Specialized Dashboards: Delivered tailored dashboards for system health, application performance, database operations, and security monitoring
Documentation & Knowledge Transfer: Provided complete documentation and training so the client's team can operate, extend, and evolve the platform independently
projects.solutionIntro: We designed and implemented a complete observability platform leveraging the Grafana ecosystem:
projects.solutionOutro: This comprehensive observability stack provides end-to-end visibility and proactive operational capabilities.
benefits: Achieve full visibility across the entire stack—from infrastructure to application
Reduce incident resolution time through proactive alerts and unified monitoring
Improve system reliability, performance, and stability
Enhance security posture with real-time monitoring of intrusion and firewall activity
Empower internal teams through knowledge transfer and easy-to-use dashboards
Establish a scalable foundation for future DevOps and SRE practices
